      • findAllBoardGames

        @GET
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response findAllBoardGames(@QueryParam(value="filter")
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> filter,
                                                         @QueryParam(value="order")
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> order)
        It receives the GET requests sent to "/boardgames" and returns all the board games existing in the database, sorted and filtered with the desired criteria.
        Parameters:
        filter - is a list of couples "filterName@filterValue", where filterName can be only one of BoardGame.FilterBy and filterValue is the string representation of the desired value for the user attribute to filter
        order - is a list of couples "orderBy@orderMode", where orderBy can be only one of BoardGame.OrderBy and orderMode can be only one of MyEntityManager.OrderMode
        Returns:
        200 OK if there are no errors in the parameters,
        400 Bad request if the parameters are not correct.
